item.title: PVA Creator Deluxe 1.54
item.description: Name : PVACreator Deluxe Version : 1.54 OS : Windows Type : PVA Account Creator Price : $918 Homepage : SalePage PVACreator is a super accounts bulk creating machine that can creating phone and email verified accounts for different sites. It can also solve captcha automatically and allow you to import proxies to register accounts.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Smart Task Manager : PVACreator allows you to create/manage/run/pause/resume multi-accounts creating tasks at the same time. Every task has full stats of account creating, you can manage and check everything easily. Auto/Custom Data Settings : PVACreator can create randomly datas like first name, last name, sex and age etc... to create your accounts, you can also import yourself data to create your accounts. Customized Save Settings : You can custom the register information to save, like you can only save username and password, or you can also set to save username, password, register proxy, register phone number, first name, last name and others. All information can be saved with created accounts if you want. Captcha Auto-Solving and Proxy Support.PVACreator can solve captcha automatically when register accounts, and you can import proxies to use in PVACreator for creating many accounts. Phone Verify Automatically : PVACreator can get phone numbers and receive sms to verify your accounts automatically. Auto-Confirm Email : When some sites need email confirmation, PVACreator can do this for you automatically too. Multi-Threads Support : You can set PVACreator to run with multi-threads to speed up the registration and create accounts for different sites at the same time. Create PVA For : Instagram, Youtube, Gmail, Twitter, Outlook, LinkedIn, Facebook, Pinterest, Reddit, Slickdeals, Amazon, SoundCloud
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • Smart Task Manager : PVACreator allows you to create/manage/run/pause/resume multi-accounts creating tasks at the same time. Every task has full stats of account creating, you can manage and check everything easily.
  • Auto/Custom Data Settings : PVACreator can create randomly datas like first name, last name, sex and age etc... to create your accounts, you can also import yourself data to create your accounts.
  • Customized Save Settings : You can custom the register information to save, like you can only save username and password, or you can also set to save username, password, register proxy, register phone number, first name, last name and others. All information can be saved with created accounts if you want.
  • Captcha Auto-Solving and Proxy Support.PVACreator can solve captcha automatically when register accounts, and you can import proxies to use in PVACreator for creating many accounts.
  • Phone Verify Automatically : PVACreator can get phone numbers and receive sms to verify your accounts automatically.
  • Auto-Confirm Email : When some sites need email confirmation, PVACreator can do this for you automatically too.
  • Multi-Threads Support : You can set PVACreator to run with multi-threads to speed up the registration and create accounts for different sites at the same time.
  • Create PVA For : Instagram, Youtube, Gmail, Twitter, Outlook, LinkedIn, Facebook, Pinterest, Reddit, Slickdeals, Amazon, SoundCloud

item.title: Turbo EAC 1.0.7 DB09
item.description: Name : Turbo EAC Version : 1.0.7 DB09 OS : Windows Type : Email Creator Price : $97 Homepage : SalePage Every inte.com marketer nowadays takes the emails they use for granted. But have you ever wondered whatâ€™s at stake if you use bad emails for your campaigns? Think about how many links you lose daily while posting with bad emails? How many accounts will vanish along with banned email addresses? No matter what marketing strategy you use, having a quality source of reliable emails at hand is essential. From the creator of Turbo Web 2.0 we bring you the fastest, most reliable email account creator ever made: TurboEAC!
item.yandex:full-text: Features SYSTEM FRIENDLY : By using our custom coded engine,the application will be very light on system usage, allowing it to run fast even on low performance computers. HIGH ACCURACY : We know that the success rate is very important for you. You will get the maximum success rate. CAPTCHA : Support for the most important captcha services (9 captcha services + custom service). Smart captcha retries based on the solving order set by the user. BULK ACCOUNTS : Optimized to select and create millions of emails accounts with just few clicks. FREE UPDATES : We are constantly adding new features and follow users requests. The included web 2.0 list is checked weekly and new sites are added to the database. All updates are completely free! USER FRIENDLY : Simple and easy to understand interface. PROXY SUPPORT : The proxy management interface comes with the options to test proxies, check response time, import/export list, delete bad proxies, etc. Supported proxies : socks, public/private and reverse proxies. SCRIPT BUILDER : Create your own templates by using our point and click visual script builder. Create your own scripts to add new email providers. EASY MANAGEMENT : Set task and click Start. You will get millions email accounts in no time, saved in a .txt file, ready to be imported in any application. SUPPORT : We are dedicated to offer the best support you can rely on. You have a question? You need support for any type of issue? We are glad to help! Very Fast! Easy to use. Create millions of accounts with just few clicks. Support for the most know captcha services. Proxy support (public/private/reverse/http and socks). Engine settings (hidden/visible/threads number). Username format composer. New email providers added constantly.
item.turbo:content:

  • SYSTEM FRIENDLY : By using our custom coded engine,the application will be very light on system usage, allowing it to run fast even on low performance computers.
  • HIGH ACCURACY : We know that the success rate is very important for you. You will get the maximum success rate.
  • CAPTCHA : Support for the most important captcha services (9 captcha services + custom service). Smart captcha retries based on the solving order set by the user.
  • BULK ACCOUNTS : Optimized to select and create millions of emails accounts with just few clicks.
  • FREE UPDATES : We are constantly adding new features and follow users requests. The included web 2.0 list is checked weekly and new sites are added to the database. All updates are completely free!
  • USER FRIENDLY : Simple and easy to understand interface.
  • PROXY SUPPORT : The proxy management interface comes with the options to test proxies, check response time, import/export list, delete bad proxies, etc. Supported proxies : socks, public/private and reverse proxies.
  • SCRIPT BUILDER : Create your own templates by using our point and click visual script builder. Create your own scripts to add new email providers.
  • EASY MANAGEMENT : Set task and click Start. You will get millions email accounts in no time, saved in a .txt file, ready to be imported in any application.
  • SUPPORT : We are dedicated to offer the best support you can rely on. You have a question? You need support for any type of issue? We are glad to help!
  • Very Fast!
  • Easy to use.
  • Create millions of accounts with just few clicks.
  • Support for the most know captcha services.
  • Proxy support (public/private/reverse/http and socks).
  • Engine settings (hidden/visible/threads number).

  • New email providers added constantly.

Hotmail Account Stream is the beginning of a new way we use accounts. Have thousands of disposable accounts ready to use in minutes!
item.yandex:full-text: Features In this test, 1000 accounts were created in 20 minutes WITH PUBLIC PROXIES This is accomplished with true socket-based multi-threading. Don't be fooled into buying bots that use hidden browsers that can only run 10 threads before your system slows to a crawl.

Features


In this test, 1000 accounts were created in 20 minutes WITH PUBLIC PROXIES
This is accomplished with true socket-based multi-threading.
Don't be fooled into buying bots that use hidden browsers that can only run 10 threads before your system slows to a crawl.

item.title: EA Creator 2.0

Create Thousands of Hotmail & AOL Accounts Automatically IN MINUTES with This Power Multi-threading Tool!
item.yandex:full-text: Features Easy to use! No special skills are required! The software works just like a wizard. After doing few very simple steps you'll have list of thousands of hotmail accounts in your hands really fast! You can customize your account's usernames using personal word lists, numbers. Support public proxies and private proxies: Load the list of proxies, press the button and see the magic! Multi-Threading allows you run up to 100 threads at once which mean u can create 100 accounts at same time. With Auto-solving captcha service like de-captcher.com, deathbycaptcha.com, you dont need to fill captcha manually. Auto create accounts every x days or x hours with Schedule Campaigns feature. You can set the date and time range for your account creation to start. NO monthly charges: .comime fee only! Stop Paying Account Resellers and Quickly Create Thousands of Hotmail Accounts Automatically IN MINUTES with FastHAC. Future Updates absolutely FREE! You'll make payment once and can use the software for lifetime. All the future updates are completely free for life!
item.turbo:content:

  • Easy to use! No special skills are required! The software works just like a wizard. After doing few very simple steps you'll have list of thousands of hotmail accounts in your hands really fast!
  • You can customize your account's usernames using personal word lists, numbers.
  • Support public proxies and private proxies: Load the list of proxies, press the button and see the magic!
  • Multi-Threading allows you run up to 100 threads at once which mean u can create 100 accounts at same time.

  • Auto create accounts every x days or x hours with Schedule Campaigns feature. You can set the date and time range for your account creation to start.

  • Future Updates absolutely FREE! You'll make payment once and can use the software for lifetime. All the future updates are completely free for life!
